name: Ovarium
description:
Let the right ones in, and protect it from the ones that only care to destroy you. 

Survive all waves and be happy about it. 

We gave birth to this weird experience in a 3 days game jam during our training at Technocité.

Inputs :
LeftClick : Repulse

(If the WebGL version feels klunky, try the downloadeable version)

Team Members:
Dev : Axel/8mpty
Art : Louis/RudaFox
GD : Ennio/Apophenia 23
